Package org.lrdm

Class TimedRDMSim

java.lang.Object
org.lrdm.TimedRDMSim
public class TimedRDMSim extends Object
Latency-aware simulator for remote data mirroring (Latency-aware RDM). Requires a sim.conf file in a resources directory located in the current working directory.
Author:
Sebastian GÃ¶tz (sebastian.goetz@acm.org)
